org.biohipi.image

Class RasterImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.biohipi.image.BioHipiImage
      • org.biohipi.image.RasterImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable

    public class RasterImage
extends BioHipiImage
    A raster image represented as an array of Java floats, which represents a flat array of uncompressed image pixel data stored in interleaved raster-scan order (e.g., RGBRGBRGB...). A RasterImage extends the abstract base class BioHipiImage and consists of a BioHipiImageHeader.
    Note that individual pixel values in a RasterImage are understood to be in a linear color space. We suggest using the setElemNonLinSRGB(int, int) method to set pixel values from 8-bit pixel values that are read from an image as these are usually represented in a non-linear gamma-compressed color space. The org.hipi.image.io package provides classes for reading (decoding) and writing (encoding) RasterImage objects in various compressed and uncompressed image formats such as JPEG and PNG.

      • equalsWithTolerance

        public boolean equalsWithTolerance(RasterImage thatImage,
                                   float maxDifference)
        Compares two RasterImage objects for equality allowing for some amount of differences in pixel values.
        Returns:
        True if the two images have equal dimensions, color spaces, and are found to deviate by less than a specified maximum difference, false otherwise.

        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Returns:
        True if the two images are found to deviate by an amount that is not representable in the underlying pixel type, false otherwise.
